power.title: Great Cleave
power.fluff: The numbers arrayed against you mean nothing as your weapon swings in a great arc, stopped by nothing so trivial as flesh and bone

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, plus an additional +1 damage for each enemy adjacent to you.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.

power.title: Avalanche Strike
power.fluff: You drop your guard and put all your strength into a devastating overhead swing

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Whirling Slayer:
section.text: The attack deals 2[W] (main) + 2[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage instead.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, attack rolls against your AC or Reflex gain a +4 bonus.

power.title: Resurgent Strike
power.fluff: You slash, the violence rejuvenating you

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You either gain 5 + your Constitution modifier temporary hit points, or end one effect on yourself.
The target takes 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you are bloodied, you can reroll the attack once.

power.title: Bloodletting
power.fluff: Your powerful attack is meant to finish off a wounded foe

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: If the target is bloodied, the attack targets Fortitude instead

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If the target is bloodied, the attack deals +1[W] damage.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: If this attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points or less, allies within 5 squares of you gain a bonus to their next damage roll before the end of your next turn. This bonus is equal to one-half your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Vault the Fallen
power.fluff: You leap from one foe to the next, leaving blood in your wake

section.name: Primary Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier + 1d6 damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 2 squares. You must end this shift within reach of an enemy other than the primary target.
If you shifted, make a secondary attack.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: The number of squares you can shift equals your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Whirling Slayer:
section.text: The number of squares you can shift equals your Dexterity modifier.

If you end the shift within reach of two enemies other than the primary target, you can make the secondary attack against both, using your main weapon for one attack and your off-hand weapon for the other.

section.name: Secondary Target:
section.text: One creature other than the primary target

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier + 1d6 damage.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: If the primary attack bloodied or reduced the target to 0 or less hit points, the secondary attack deals additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Whirling Frenzy
power.fluff: Someone will bleed after every strike of this frenzy - you would prefer to see your enemy's blood but are prepared to see your own

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength (main) vs. AC

section.name: Whirling Slayer:
section.text: The attack can target Reflex instead

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) + 1[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You take 1d6 damage for each miss. This damage cannot be reduced or negated.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: You gain a +1 cumulative bonus to your first damage roll before the end of your next turn for each miss.

power.title: Desperate Fury
power.fluff: Even if it kills you, you'll accept nothing less than a solid hit

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You can take 5 damage to reroll the attack. This damage cannot be reduced or negated.
If the rerolled attack misses, you can continue to take 5 damage each time to reroll the attack again.
If you become bloodied because of this damage, you gain a +2 bonus to further rerolled attack rolls.

If this damage drops you to 0 hit points or less, you gain a +4 bonus to further rerolled attack rolls and do not become dying and unconscious before this power has been resolved. You can reroll the attack even if the damage kills you, but only once.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: If you rerolled the attack at least once, it deals additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
If you become bloodied because of this damage, increase the additional damage to twice your Constitution modifier.
If this damage drops you to 0 hit points or less, increase the additional damage to three times your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Escalating Violence
power.fluff: You hack at your enemy, daring it and its companions to incur your fury further

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If you take damage before the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack rolls and damage rolls of your next attack.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: If you become bloodied before the start of your next turn, the bonus equals your Constitution modifier instead.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: If you take damage before the start of your next turn, one ally of your choice within 5 squares of you gains a bonus to their first damage roll against the creature that damaged you. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier, and lasts until the end of the ally's next turn.
If you take damage more than once before the start of your next turn, you can choose a different ally each time.

power.title: Shout of Terror
power.fluff: The primal storm that rages within you manifests as a terrifying battle scream that causes enemies to hesitate

section.name: Primary Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage, and you make the shout attack.
You must include the primary target in the shout attack's area.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against creatures under a Fear effect.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: One ally within 5 squares of you gains a bonus to his or her first damage roll against a creature under a Fear effect. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier and lasts until the end of his or her next turn.

section.name: Thunderborn Wrath:
section.text: The bonus to damage rolls equals your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: If you are bloodied, the range increases to Close blast 4

section.name: Shout Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the blast

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Room for Carnage
power.fluff: You drive your foes backward with the haft of your weapon, giving you enough room to deliver a mighty blow

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You push each enemy adjacent to you 1 square.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
You gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each enemy you pushed

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If the target was not adjacent to you when you used this power, it deals +1[W] damage.

power.title: Rending Strike
power.fluff: You tear your weapon through your opponent's defences, leaving it vulnerable to an ally's attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is subject to your rending until the start of your next turn.
When you hit, choose whether your rending makes the target vulnerable to all damage equal to your Charisma modifier, or allows each attack that hits the target to also slide it 1 square.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: If the target is bloodied, the vulnerable is equal to your Constitution modifier instead.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: Your rending both makes the target vulnerable and allows hits to slide it.

section.name: Thunderborn Wrath:
section.text: The slide is a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Batter Down
power.fluff: You hammer your enemy, knocking it to the ground or burying it even deeper

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
If the target was already prone, this attack deals +1[W] damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If the target is prone, you deal 2 + Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.
